title: What branch of science is zoology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Zoology belongs to the branch of science known as Life sciences. Life sciences “describe living organisms, their internal processes, and their relationship to each other and the environment…” Further information can be found in this website known as Branches of Science, and this Wiki page: Branches of science - Wikipedia. I hope this helps :).

They study animals, from the smallest organisms to the highest forms of animal life. Their behavior, anatomy and physiology, what species of animals they are related to and evolved from. The short answer.
